thread.title: GOP Sen. Delays Speech At Last Minute As Hundreds Of Protesters Show Up
thread.title_full: GOP Sen. Delays Speech At Last Minute As Hundreds Of Protesters Show Up

author: Caitlin MacNeal
title: GOP Sen. Delays Speech At Last Minute As Hundreds Of Protesters Show Up
text:
As hundreds of protesters gathered at the Montana state capitol for a speech from Sen. Steve Daines (R-MN) on Tuesday, the Republican lawmaker postponed his address under two hours before he was scheduled to speak.
Daines will instead give a speech on Wednesday, and his office said that the delay had nothing to do with the protest, according to Montana Public Radio .
